org.hyperic.hq.hqapi1
Class RoleApi

java.lang.Object
  org.hyperic.hq.hqapi1.RoleApi

public class RoleApi
extends java.lang.Object

The Hyperic HQ Role API. This class provides access to the roles within the HQ system. Each of the methods in this class return Response objects that wrap the result of the method with a ResponseStatus and a ServiceError that indicates the error if the response status is ResponseStatus.FAILURE.

getRoles

public RolesResponse getRoles()
                       throws java.io.IOException
Find all Roles in the system.

Returns:
On ResponseStatus.SUCCESS, a list of roles is returned.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - If a network error occurs while making the request.

getRole

public RoleResponse getRole(java.lang.String name)
                     throws java.io.IOException
Get a Role by name.

Parameters:
name - The role name to search for.
Returns:
On ResponseStatus.SUCCESS, the Role by the given name is returned via RoleResponse.getRole().
Throws:
java.io.IOException - If a network error occurs while making the request.
